name: TurretCraft
description: Build maze, send units, destroy your opponents! TurretCraft is a fast paced, competitive tower defense game with multiplayer, mazing, and mercenaries.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: Intel i3 equivalent or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 equivalent or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 550 MB available space
